name: part_004
file: tmp_【#ノエル生誕はっぴーLIVE】今日は誕生日！！好きなことしてはっぴーになろおおお✨【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [E1HXg-kjOI8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Noel Shirogane performs a solo version of 'Fuwa Fuwa Time' (ふわふわ時間).
A transition period with a black screen and instrumental music.
Noel Shirogane, Chloe Sakamata, and Pekora Usada perform the song 'Golden Time Lover' (ゴールデンタイムラバー).

subtitles.original: ...たい気持ちで頭の中
subtitles.english: ...with these feelings, my head is...

subtitles.original: ふわふわってなってるよ
subtitles.english: ...becoming fluffy.

subtitles.original: 手をつないで
subtitles.english: Hold my hand.

subtitles.original: 離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let go.

subtitles.original: 見つめ合って
subtitles.english: Stare into each other's eyes.

subtitles.original: 抱きしめ合って
subtitles.english: Embrace each other.

subtitles.original: キスし合って
subtitles.english: Kiss each other.

subtitles.original: 髪を触って
subtitles.english: Touch my hair.

subtitles.original: いつまでもずっとこうしてて
subtitles.english: Let's stay like this forever.

subtitles.original: 甘いものが好きで盛り上がって
subtitles.english: We got excited over liking sweet things,

subtitles.original: 食べに行こうよなんてなって
subtitles.english: And we talked about going out to eat.

subtitles.original: ランチならまあいいかって
subtitles.english: I thought, "Lunch should be fine,"

subtitles.original: なんかありがちな感じよね
subtitles.english: It's such a common feeling, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ビュッフェの列に並んでたの
subtitles.english: We were standing in the buffet line,

subtitles.original: 普通に話してるんだけど
subtitles.english: Just talking normally,

subtitles.original: 顔近すぎだってまたなんか
subtitles.english: But our faces were too close, and once again,

subtitles.original: 意味なくドキッとしたりして
subtitles.english: My heart skipped a beat for no reason.

subtitles.original: ピアスこれいいねって褒められて
subtitles.english: You complimented my earrings, saying they looked good,

subtitles.original: 舞い上がったけど彼女にも
subtitles.english: And I was over the moon, but then you said,

subtitles.original: 見せてあげようって写メ撮られるって
subtitles.english: "Let me show them to her," and you took a photo.

subtitles.original: これどうなの?
subtitles.english: What's the deal with that?

subtitles.original: そう、よなんでこんな惨めな気分なの
subtitles.english: Right, why do I feel so miserable like this?

subtitles.original: 戦うことすらできないバリア
subtitles.english: A barrier I can't even fight against

subtitles.original: 張られちゃって、No!
subtitles.english: has been put up. No!

subtitles.original: 大好きになった同士
subtitles.english: Even though we've just become

subtitles.original: 見つめあったばかりなんなんだけど
subtitles.english: people who love each other and stare at each other,

subtitles.original: 悲しい気持ちが溢れてきて
subtitles.english: Sad feelings are overflowing,

subtitles.original: 胸がキュンってなってるよ
subtitles.english: And my chest feels tight.

subtitles.original: そうよ、大好きなんだなんだかんだ
subtitles.english: That's right, I love you, somehow or another.

subtitles.original: 止まらなくなっちゃったかも
subtitles.english: I might not be able to stop.

subtitles.original: 行けない、気持ちで体中
subtitles.english: With these hopeless feelings, my whole body

subtitles.original: ふわふわってなってるよ
subtitles.english: is becoming fluffy.

subtitles.original: 手をつないで
subtitles.english: Hold my hand.

subtitles.original: 離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let go.

subtitles.original: 見つめ合って
subtitles.english: Stare into each other's eyes.

subtitles.original: 抱きしめ合って
subtitles.english: Embrace each other.

subtitles.original: キスし合って
subtitles.english: Kiss each other.

subtitles.original: 髪を触って
subtitles.english: Touch my hair.

subtitles.original: いつまでもずっとこうしてて
subtitles.english: Let's stay like this forever.

subtitles.original: もしも願いが叶うなら
subtitles.english: If my wish could come true,

subtitles.original: 出会いの日リセットボタンを押させて
subtitles.english: Let me press the reset button on the day we met.

subtitles.original: そうよ、神様この馬鹿な鐘が
subtitles.english: That's right, God, before this stupid bell

subtitles.original: 恋なんてする前のピュアな心に
subtitles.english: begins to ring, to my pure heart before falling in love,

subtitles.original: 私を連れてって下さい
subtitles.english: please take me back there.

subtitles.original: ゴールデンタイムラバー / 作詞・作曲：スキマスイッチ
subtitles.english: Golden Time Lover / Lyrics & Composition: Sukima Switch

subtitles.original: 集中できていないな まだ体が迷っているんだ
subtitles.english: I can't seem to concentrate, my body is still hesitating.

subtitles.original: 震えていたんじゃ コントロールしたってブレるんだ
subtitles.english: If I'm trembling, even if I'm in control, I'll still waver.

subtitles.original: 太陽も月もなんも 完全にこっち向いていないが
subtitles.english: Neither the sun nor the moon are turned this way at all.

subtitles.original: やるしかないんだと 言い聞かせるようにそうつぶやいた
subtitles.english: Telling myself I have no choice, I whispered it as if to convince myself.

subtitles.original: 状況は悪いが ただ逃げ出すんじゃ根性ないな
subtitles.english: The situation is bad, but just running away shows no guts.

subtitles.original: 展望はないが 度胸でクリアするしかないや
subtitles.english: There's no outlook, but I've got no choice but to clear it with nerve.

subtitles.original: 衝動は抑えたまま ターゲットとの間隔探れ
subtitles.english: With my impulses suppressed, I'll gauge the distance from the target.

subtitles.original: 必要なもんは 勝つプライド
subtitles.english: What I need is the pride to win.

subtitles.original: 味わうのは勝利の美酒か それとも敗北の苦汁か
subtitles.english: Shall I taste the sweet wine of victory, or the bitter dregs of defeat?

subtitles.original: そう すべては2つに1つ
subtitles.english: Right, it's always one of two choices.

subtitles.original: 操りたい運命の糸を
subtitles.english: I want to manipulate the threads of fate.

subtitles.original: 絶好のゴールデンタイム
subtitles.english: The perfect golden time,

subtitles.original: この手で掴め
subtitles.english: Seize it with these hands.

subtitles.original: 渾身のポーカーフェイス
subtitles.english: My best poker face,

subtitles.original: キメて仕掛けるよ
subtitles.english: I'll set it and make my move.

subtitles.original: イリュージョンの世界へ引き込んで
subtitles.english: Into a world of illusion, dragging you in.

subtitles.original: 引き込んで
subtitles.english: Dragging you in...

subtitles.original: 際限ないプレッシャーゲーム
subtitles.english: A limitless pressure game,

subtitles.original: スルリと抜けて
subtitles.english: Slip right through it.

subtitles.original: 栄光のボーダーライン
subtitles.english: The border line of glory,

subtitles.original: 飛び越えるために
subtitles.english: In order to leap over it.

subtitles.original: ハウメニー?
subtitles.english: How many?

subtitles.original: どれくらいの代償いる?
subtitles.english: How much of a price is required?
